SHIP MANAGEMENT

  • Varamar
  • Our projects

VARAMAR provides Commercial management and fleet operations support to owners of heavy-, multipurpose-, breakbulk- and dry-bulk fleet.

This includes cargo canvassing, chartering, port operations and fleet operations from either Vancouver, Hamburg, Genoa, Athens, Shanghai, Odessa, Antwerp or Dubai.
